channel.title: Client Upload Help
channel.description: Ok so i made a client for my server and i want to upload it so people can use it but before i was about to upload it i realized that they will have access to the class8.java and able to edit it and what not. Does anyone know how to convert them into a type of a file that no one can edit them except me?

item.title: Client Upload Help
item.dc:creator: @Massive-Pk Massive-Pk
item.description:
@Massive-Pk wrote:

^^ lol i was bout to reply to my post and say the same thing. good job

Read full topic

item.title: Client Upload Help
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

clients, do not need .java files to run

just make a file on your desktop, and move all of your .java files in there, then go bak right click your server file, and add to archive, and its a closed client

then you can release and its uneditable

Read full topic

item.title: Client Upload Help
item.dc:creator: @Massive-Pk Massive-Pk
item.description:
@Massive-Pk wrote:

IMO, i think you should just upload it, dont worry about all of that stuff, they will always find a way to edit it anyways.

Read full topic
